Text: Yawn! Another pathetic piece of shit Holocaust denier. Eat shit, pig!

It's incredible how these dinosaurs don't realize their game is up... Lies about WW2 won't make the bastard nazis look any better than frenzied racists murderers, all your pathetic lies have been exposed hundreds of times, only for the ignorant redneck who chooses to believe this nonsense.
It's telling that the critics of revisionism resort to name-calling and abuse.  But the truth does not fear investigation.  Read these books and make up your own mind.
I reserve name calling for a very small number of people, like you; you psychotic fuck.
If you want the truth: http://forum.codoh.info/index.php
be warned Jew hater , you are being watched .......
Notice how none of the people that think this crap were alive during that period..and most are the products of a poor public education.

"none of the people that think this crap were alive during that period"

Except, you know, the authors of many of these books, who not only were alive during the war but wrote within the decade immediately following the war.  For example,  Paul Rassinier, Harry Elmer Barnes, Charles Callan Tansill, Russel Grenfell, F.J.P. Veale, William Henry Chamberlin...

'Notice how none of the people that think this crap were alive during that period'

Many are the children or grandchildren of war criminals who escaped justice and poisoned their minds or just abnormal beings who love tyranny and oppression and mass murder.
